title: Finns Beach Club Poolside Fun (Half-day)
overview: Enjoy pools, bars, and live entertainment at the lively Finns Beach Club in Canggu.

stops.description: Arrive and relax by the pool, enjoy drinks and music.

title: Finns Beach Club All Day (Full-day)
overview: A full day of poolside lounging, live music, and beachfront fun at Finns Beach Club.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy the pool, cabanas, and beachfront bar.
Relax by the pool, enjoy live music, or participate in club activities.
